data.name: Seed.subheader
data.value: Write down each word in order and store it in a safe place.

data.name: Backup.header
data.value: Your backup recovery key is the only way to restore your wallet if your phone is lost, stolen, broken or upgraded.

data.name: Backup.subheader
data.value: We will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.

data.name: BackupConfirm.header
data.value: To make sure everything was written down correctly, please enter the following words from your backup recovery key.

data.name: BackupConfirm.warning
data.value: That word is not in your mnemonic.

data.name: BackupConfirm.exercise
data.value: Choose the {0} word from your mnemonic:

data.name: BackupWord.next
data.comment: label for backup word next button

data.name: BackupWord.previous
data.comment: label for backup word previous button

data.name: BackupWord.header
data.value: Write down each word in order and store it in a safe place.

data.name: Pin.header
data.value: Your PIN will be used to unlock your wallet and send money.

data.name: Pin.warning
data.value: Remember this PIN. If you forget it, you won't be able to access your bitcoin.

data.name: Recover.header
data.value: Recover your wallet with your backup key.

data.name: RecoverEntry.header
data.comment: label for recover wallet entry header

data.name: RecoverEntry.title
data.value: Enter the backup recovery key for the wallet you want to recover.
data.comment: label for recover wallet entry title

data.name: Recover.alertTitle
data.comment: label for recover wallet entry alert title

data.name: Recover.alertHeader
data.value: One or more of the words you entered are either mispelled or invalid.
data.comment: label for recover wallet entry alert header

data.name: Recover.alertButton
data.comment: label for recover wallet entry alert button

data.name: Send.transactionMessage
data.value: Would you like to send {0} ({1} + {2}) BTC to {3}?
data.comment: label for send transaction popup message

data.name: Send.transactionOk
data.comment: label for send transaction popup ok button

data.name: Send.transactionCancel
data.comment: label for send transaction popup cancel button

data.name: Receive.requestAmount
data.comment: label for receive request amount button

data.name: SecurityCenter.header
data.value: Enable all security features for maximum protection.

data.name: SecurityCenter.pinHeader
data.comment: label for security center pin header

data.name: SecurityCenter.pinDetail
data.value: Protects your wallet from unauthorized users.
data.comment: label for security center pin detail

data.name: SecurityCenter.fingerprintHeaderIOS
data.comment: label for security center fingerprint header for ios

data.name: SecurityCenter.fingerprintHeaderAndroid
data.comment: label for security center fingerprint header for android

data.name: SecurityCenter.fingerprintDetail
data.value: Conveniently unlock your wallet and send money up to a set limit.
data.comment: label for security center fingerprint detail

data.name: SecurityCenter.mnemonicHeader
data.comment: label for security center mnemonic header

data.name: SecurityCenter.mnemonicDetail
data.value: The only way to access your bitcoin if you lose or upgrade your phone.
data.comment: label for security center mnemonic detail

data.name: FingerprintAuth.header
data.value: Use your fingerprint to unlock your wallet and send money up to a set limit.

data.name: FingerprintAuth.switchLabelIOS
data.comment: label for fingerprint auth slider on IOS

data.name: FingerprintAuth.switchAndroid
data.comment: label for fingerprint auth slider on android

data.name: FingerprintAuth.spendingLimit
data.comment: label for fingerprint auth spending limit

data.name: FingerprintAuth.subheader
data.value: You can customize your touch ID spending limit from the

data.name: FingerprintAuth.limitButtonIOS
data.comment: label for spending limit button on IOS

data.name: FingerprintAuth.limitButtonAndroid
data.comment: label for spending limit button on Android

data.name: Send.addressDetectedOnClipboardTitle
data.comment: title of the dialog to use address on clipboard.

data.name: Send.addressDetectedOnClipboardMessage
data.value: Address {0} is on your clipboard would you like to use it to send Bitcoin to it?

data.name: NowLoading.text
data.comment: text that shows with the activity indicator

data.name: AccountSelection.title
data.comment: label for account selection view title

data.name: AccountSelection.header
data.value: Please enter a name for this account.

data.name: AccountSelection.subheader
data.value: Choose from the options below which type of account you want to create.

data.name: AddAccount.subheader
data.value: Select from a variety of account types.
